answers.answer: Hi and welcome to this forum if no one has already told you that.  The LP as I understand it is not definitive for an MS diagnosis.  Does your neuro offer any other suggestions as to what might be going on with you?  There are a few other things that would cause spots on your brain MRI.  I would talk with the neuro about those as well and don 't limit yourself to thinking just MS.I'm not the medical person here so I can't offer much more than a warm welcome and I hope you will stick around and let these other smart people help you.Be well, Lulu
oops! I should have told you to post this in the MS community and see what our members have to say to you - they are a  very vocal group.  Lulu

Thank you for the warm welcome :) I did re-post this into MS forum I also had place it here just so I can get a perspective on all the other Nuero issue that may cause my symptoms. Also no one told me the LP was a long shot of an MS diagnosis, my Neuro told me it was clean and he is not sure of whats going on and think the spot are just from the headache and yet I still deal with pin and needles, spasm, the whites in corner of eyes as well some speech issues.

Hi,Thanks for writing in.Chronic headaches can cause white spots in the brain and so can smoking, alcoholism, diabetes and high BP.Since MS has been ruled out other possibilities like Fibromyalgia, chronic fatigue syndrome and peripheral neuropathy need to be ruled out.Please discuss these possibilities with your treating doctor and take OTC vitamin supplements.Let us know if you need more information.

Thank you for responses,I will have the MD check for Fibromyalgia, chronic fatigue syndrome and peripheral neuropathy.  A little background about myself is that I do not smoke,or heavy drink only drink occasionally and  thats only holidays lol. As well my BP level is great base on what doctor told me. My Nuero is trying to rule out diabetes and since all my blood test result came back negative they all at a lost. I have gone through over 6 different prescriptions and less then 4 months. My Neuro had stated it maybe early MS since my symptoms are not just headache but fall more along those terms and I also notice im very irritated to heat as well my symptoms are or  get worse.

question: I've been having some weird symptomsHeadache that some last all day to the next, white spot in corner of eyes as I move eyes,muscle spasm - all over, side of my head, thighs, face,and etc. Pins and needles in feet and hand.Burning sensation sometimes weird pain in arm and leg but I have no damage to the area.This all started on a night before as I went to sleep my right leg felt weird to the point of numbness and pain but prior to that I always had headaches since I was 13 used to go through pain killers then it stop when I was about 15 had moment when I was unable to stand for a long time legs would get very irritated with tingling feeling. I had never went to the doctor regarding it till after that one night where leg felt numb and had pain.  My MD gave me few presciption for the headache but still had other symptom and still had headache, finaly she sent me to a Nuero.I did a CT scan with contrast came negativeDid MRI with contrast, Nuero found a few spots in MRI some small some largeDid an LP came back negativeBlood work negativeMy Nuero had first told me it maybe early MS but his not sure till LP was complete after LP he said it not MS. Yet Im still dealing with these symptoms.I still have headache, pins and needles in feet and hand, still have muscle spasm and deal with  random aches, tiredness and  toes twitching, burning sensations.Have anyone deal with such things before? and Also what other test can I do to help with these symptoms?
title: Costly Unsure Of Symptoms
